Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to NthGrow Smart, the seamless way to manage and monitor your NthGrow smart planting devices using Alexa voice commands! This skill transforms how you interact with your garden, making plant care more efficient and enjoyable.

Key Features:

Voice-Controlled Operations : Turn lights on/off, adjust temperature, and set watering schedules using simple voice commands.
Real-Time Monitoring : Access real-time updates on soil moisture, humidity, temperature, and other critical metrics.
Notifications & Reminders : Get proactive alerts regarding watering schedules, plant health, and growth progress.
Prerequisites:

Hardware Requirements : Compatible NthGrow smart planting devices.
Account Requirements : An active and linked NthGrow account.
Connectivity Requirements : Stable internet connection for real-time data and voice command functionality.
Supported Devices : All Alexa-enabled devices.
Get Started in a Few Easy Steps:

Download the NthGrow App from the App Store or Google Play Store.
Create a new NthGrow account or log in to your existing account.
Enable the NthGrow Smart skill in the Alexa app.
Link your NthGrow account by following the provided prompts.
